rows.line: The Ahaz brigade left for the continuation of the attack in order to conquer the Ramatanya hills.
A small force of the brigade managed to climb Ramataniya Hill but
The shortage of ammunition and fuel resulted in the needle decision
When I get into the saddle I discover in front of me in the area of Hushniyeh
Dozens of tanks in a state of posture, not even in a state of battle
And I, like at the range, start shooting at them. I destroyed about 7 or 8 tanks, alone
And immediately this entire battalion, a battalion and a half that was here woke up and shot in my direction
And while conducting the battle I took a direct hit
MAHASH probably between the tomb and the minaret,
We went out with the tank, the tank our contact Saeed was seriously injured in the pelvis
We rescued him from the tank. We carried him on our backs along the village until we left the outskirts of the village
There we actually saw Harel start to come back
Luckily he was looking at us
We waved at him to come in our direction and indeed Harel really came back
And the forces returned to Nefh to reorganize
